did.abstract: Samuel Simons was a U.S. Representative from Connecticut. Collection contains a letter from Samuel Simons to an unnamed recipient describing the recent election which he narrowly won against a Whig candidate.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Samuel Simons was a U.S. Representative from Connecticut.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: Collection contains a letter from Samuel Simons to an unnamed recipient describing the recent election which he narrowly won against a Whig candidate, "They have spent their money and circulated their infamory falsehoods, coffin handbills & [et]c & [et]c but the secret is they all came out, & so did we. They made 50 difference here on the Temperance subject."
